Kerrigan.name: Ravage
Kerrigan.description: Leap to a target, dealing 210 (+4% per level) damage. If the enemy dies within 1.5 seconds, this cooldown is instantly reset.

Kerrigan.name: Impaling Blades
Kerrigan.description: After 1.25 seconds, deal 261 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within the target area, stunning them for 1 second.

Kerrigan.name: Primal Grasp
Kerrigan.description: Pulls enemies within the target area towards you, dealing 114 (+4% per level) damage.

Kerrigan.name: Summon Ultralisk
Kerrigan.description: Summon an Ultralisk that attacks the target to deal 100 (+4% per level) damage. Attacks splash to nearby enemies for 50% damage. Can reactivate the Ability to retarget the Ultralisk. Lasts for 20 seconds.

Kerrigan.name: Maelstrom
Kerrigan.description: Deals 74 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Lasts for 7 seconds.

Kerrigan.name: Assimilation
Kerrigan.description: Gain 10% of damage dealt from Basic Attacks and Abilities as Shields for 6 seconds. Shield amount gained doubled against Heroes.  Current maximum: 1004 (+4% per level)

1.name: Block
1.description: Every 5 seconds, gain 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%. Stores up to 2 charges.

1.name: Siphoning Impact
1.description: If the targeted enemy dies within 1.5 seconds, Kerrigan heals for 10% of her maximum Health.

4.name: Clean Kill
4.description: If Ravage kills the target, it restores 75% of its Mana cost and increases the damage of your next Ravage by 25%.

4.name: Envenom
4.description: Activate to poison an enemy Hero, dealing 352 (+4% per level) damage over 10 seconds.

4.name: Fury of the Swarm
4.description: Your Basic Attacks splash for 60% damage around the target.

4.name: Psionic Pulse
4.description: After casting Primal Grasp, deal 36 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Lasts 5 seconds.

7.name: Assimilation Mastery
7.description: Increases the duration of Assimilation by 100%. While Assimilation is active, your Health and Mana regeneration is increased by 100%.

7.name: Bladed Momentum
7.description: Basic Attacks reduce your Basic Ability cooldowns by 0.6 seconds.

10.name: Maelstrom
10.description: Deals 74 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Lasts for 7 seconds.

10.name: Summon Ultralisk
10.description: Summon an Ultralisk that attacks the target to deal 100 (+4% per level) damage. Attacks splash to nearby enemies for 50% damage. Can reactivate the Ability to retarget the Ultralisk. Lasts for 20 seconds.

13.name: Double Strike
13.description: When your Basic Abilities damage an enemy, your next Basic Attack hits for 75% bonus damage.

13.name: Queen's Rush
13.description: Activate to increase your Movement Speed by 30% for 4 seconds. Queen's Rush is also applied for free on Takedowns.

16.name: Aggressive Defense
16.description: Increases base Shield amount gained from Assimilation by 100%.

16.name: Essence for Essence
16.description: Activate to deal 10% of target enemy Hero's Max Health and gain Assimilation Shields for twice that amount.

16.name: Overdrive
16.description: Activate to increase Ability Power by 25% and Mana costs by 40% for 5 seconds.

20.name: Nexus Blades
20.description: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.

20.name: Omegastorm
20.description: Maelstrom size increased by 25%. Amount of Assimilation Shields generated by Maelstrom increased by 100%.

20.name: Psionic Shift
20.description: Activate to teleport to a nearby location, dealing 50 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies. Generates 300% increased Assimilation Shields from the damage dealt.

20.name: Torrasque
20.description: The Ultralisk morphs into an egg when it dies. If the egg isn't killed within 4 seconds, a new Ultralisk is born.
